entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023
